items.sentence: The first time Tom brought Mary home, his mother said, "This one\'s a keeper."
I don\'t have a washing machine, so I go to the laundromat to wash my clothes.
Tom would\'ve been thirty years old today if he hadn\'t passed away last year.
Tom was an elementary school music teacher before he became a studio musician.
Tom broke into Mary\'s car and stole what was hidden under the driver\'s seat.
I don\'t know why, but I\'m sure that Tom has his reasons for not hiring Mary.
Tom was about to go home, but Mary came, so he decided to stay a litle longer.
I wanted Tom to take some aspirin, but he said he didn\'t think it would help.
I wanted to have lunch with Tom tomorrow, but he told me he\'d be out of town.
Tom soon discovered that he could speak French better than his French teacher.
